settlements.settlement_name: Oklahoma Spine Hospital - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Received a notice stating that your personal information was exposed in a July 2024 Oklahoma Spine Hospital data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Nations Direct Mortgage - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Private information was compromised in the December 2023 Nations Direct Mortgage data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Restek Corporation - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in the June 2023 Restek Corporation data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Behavioral Health Resources - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Received notice of the November 2024 Behavioral Health Resources data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Dakota Eye Institute - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a Dakota Eye Institute data breach discovered in October 2023

settlements.settlement_name: Instinct Pet Foods - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a data breach Instinct Pet Foods discovered in October 2024

settlements.settlement_name: Planned Parenthood of Montana - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Received notice that their private information may have been compromised in a Planned Parenthood of Montana data breach, which took place in August 2024

settlements.settlement_name: City of Hope National Medical Center - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Received notice of a data breach affecting City of Hope National Medical Center that was discovered in October 2023

settlements.settlement_name: Orthopedics Rhode Island - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Were sent a notice stating that your personal information was potentially compromised in a September 2024 Orthopedics Rhode Island data breach

settlements.settlement_name: San Diego Unified School District - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: California residents who received notification from SDUSD that their Personal Information may have been compromised in the ransomware incident on October 25, 2022

settlements.settlement_name: Therapeutic Health Services - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was compromised in a February 2024 data breach involving Therapeutic Health Services

settlements.settlement_name: RIBridges - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a data breach involving the Rhode Island RIBridges system

settlements.settlement_name: Cencora, The Lash Group - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a data breach disclosed in February 2024 that involved Cencora or The Lash Group

settlements.settlement_name: Trinity Health Corporation - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Personal information was exposed in a January 2021 data breach affecting Trinity Health Corporation

settlements.eligibility: Data breach victims

settlements.eligibility: Data breach victims

settlements.eligibility: Data breach victims

settlements.eligibility: Data breach victims

settlements.eligibility: Data breach victims

settlements.settlement_name: Silvergate Bank FTX Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: FTX customers affected by Silvergate Bank

settlements.settlement_name: Joybird, La-Z-Boy deceptive discounts class action settlement
settlements.eligibility: Purchased Joybird or La-Z-Boy products during the class period

settlements.settlement_name: 23andMe - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility: Were a 23andMe customer between May 1, 2023 and October 1, 2023 and received notice that your personal information was compromised in a data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Alabama Cardiovascular Group data breach class action settlement
settlements.payout_description: Up to $5,000 for documented losses or a pro rata cash payment, plus two years of credit monitoring
settlements.eligibility: Alabama Cardiovascular Group data breach victims
